# What to do when the report fails to render?

Render report and it fails, look at error message to see where it failed.

Running that specific chunk might lead to a better error message.

# Common errors

Working directory

Duplicated chunk labels are a no no.

YAML indentation

# How to get help?

Report an issue.

Quarto is relatively new, so it might be a bug. Look at issues.
